name: portworx-kafka
preInstallNotes:
Default configuration requires 3 agent nodes each with: 1.0 CPU | 2048 MB MEM

Portworx should be installed on the Private Agents to be able to provision volumes.

Community packages are unverified and unreviewed content from the community.
postInstallNotes:
DC/OS Apache Kafka Service is being installed.

	Documentation: https://docs.portworx.com/scheduler/mesosphere-dcos/kafka.html
postUninstallNotes:
DC/OS Apache Kafka Service is being uninstalled.
Please follow the instructions at https://docs.portworx.com/scheduler/mesosphere-dcos/framework_cleanup.html to remove any persistent state if required.
